definition: a bit for enlarging the upper part of a hole, to insert a nail or screw below the surface, as into a countersink
details:
noun
- a bit for enlarging the upper part of a hole
= synonyms: counterbore
- a hole (usually in wood) with the top part enlarged so that a screw or bolt will fit into it and lie below the surface
verb
- to insert a nail or screw below the surface, as into a countersink
= example: to insert a nail or screw below the surface, as into a countersink
= synonyms: set
